ER_Create_ValidName: Must enter a valid value for Name
ER_Create_Mandatory: Fields in red italics are required
ER_NON_UNIQUE: Configuration Rule(Matrix/Expression) with same name already exists. Please enter a different name.
ER_SAVE_CONFLICT: Expression Rule contains at least one conflict
ER_Create_ValidNameLength: The Object name exceeds the maximum length allowed. Please enter a different name.
